education.program: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

work.description: Build a live streaming app for Yahoo Auction in 2 months using React Native, with 1 techinical partner and 1 designer

Technical components include React Native, Redux, WebRTC, Firebase, OAuth 2

work.description: Troubleshooting and queries answering in the lab, with over 120 students

Ability to come up with solutions efficiently when facing problems or failures

voluntary.description: English course design and teaching, targeted on grade nine and university students
highlight: Ability to convey complicated ideas to others in a compact and simplified form
Ability to design creative course material

competition.title: UBS Group Technology Case Study Challenge
competition.description: Developing a plan to improve client experience using technology, with a team of 3

Technical components include NodeJS, AWS deployment, Firebase, FB API

competition.title: ACM Hong Kong Chapter
competition.description: 3rd runner-up team competing with over 30 teams from universities of Hong Kong and Macau, 3 members each

competition.title: Project Competition
competition.description: Building a Rube Goldberg Machine; 3rd place out of 30 teams with 5 members each
highlight: Ability to collaborate with people from a diversity of backgrounds
